articles.author: Marc Lallanilla
articles.title: Cancer cases are rising among younger Americans: 'alarming' trend - New York Post
articles.description: Among people aged 30 to 39 years, rates of cancer jumped almost 20% between 2010 and 2019, stunning some researchers.
articles.content:
Cancer experts have discovered a grim new trend: Rates of cancer among young people have risen sharply in recent years even as rates have dropped among people older than 50.
The biggest increase occ… [+3272 chars]

articles.title: Study explores vaping trends among US adults with cardiovascular disease - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: A new paper discusses the trends in the use of e-cigarettes among American adults with pre-existing cardiovascular disease (CVD).
articles.content: A new paper published in JAMA Network Open discusses the trends in the use of e-cigarettes among American adults with pre-existing cardiovascular disease (CVD). Smoking tobacco is a widespread practi… [+4349 chars]
